byline.original: By SCOTT SHANE AND SCOTT SHANE

abstract: Dispatch column by journalist Scott Shane and business professor Scott Shane describes how both men have been confused for one another for over two decades; contends problem is exacerbated by Internet era, in which people are not just flesh and blood, but also electronic composites.
snippet: When two people in rather public professions have the same name, things can get confusing.
lead_paragraph: When two people in rather public professions have the same name, things can get confusing.
